pages.text:
SOLON
Private Parties & Events
MOMENTS, MADE MEMORABLE
We believe the best moments are shared—around the table, with good food, great company, and genuine hospitality. From corporate dinner meetings and cocktail parties to bridal showers and retirement luncheons, Burntwood Tavern offers a warm and inviting atmosphere perfect for any occasion.
Inquire Now

Slide 10 (current slide)
“
Our event was flaw­less from start to fin­ish. The Burntwood Tavern team made our father’s 60th birth­day cel­e­bra­tion a day our entire fam­i­ly will nev­er for­get. Thank you for everything!
”
— Jill S.
The Harvest Room
Set beneath wood-beamed ceilings and rustic chandeliers, this intimate space features two dining tables seating up to 12 each. The Harvest Room accommodates up to 22 guests for a seated lunch or dinner.
The Banquet Room
Located just off the main dining room, this spacious setting is framed by wood beams and illuminated by hand-blown glass pendants. The Banquet Room accommodates up to 54 guests for a seated event or 60 for a reception.
Moments, Made Memorable
